page.title: 09THERFIELD CHAPEL
page.content: The Chapel was built in 1843 but the interior was completely changed and re-furbished in the 1960's. It is attached to the Manse where the present pastor,Rev. Allon Taffs, lives.About 60 people attend Sunday services regularly, only 6 from Therfield, 50% from Royston,and the rest from surrounding villages within approximately a 7 mile radius of Therfield. The majority are under 45,and there are 6 families with school-age children. A mid-week coffee bar caters for about a dozen teenagers plus other young-at-hearts. We want to share our belief in a loving,self giving God who sent His son,Jesus,to restore our broken relationship with Himself.To this end,the Chapel also runs a thriving Sunday school and a Young People's group in Royston on Sundays.
